cooladaLoader
Class ModelData

java.lang.Object
  cooladaLoader.ModelData
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
 class ModelData
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

This class wrapps all required model data to make it serializable. The goal is to make PImage serializable and avoid copies of same textures when save to disk

Version:
1.0
Author:
Markus Zimmermann http://www.die-seite.ch

(package private)  Triangle[] getTriangles()
           
private  void mapImageData()
          this method initiates the hashmap with textures. the idea is to serialize no doubled referred images and save performance
(package private)  void recoverPImages(processing.core.PApplet applet)
          Wraps texture data back into PImage and links to all referenced triangles.

mapImageData

private void mapImageData()
this method initiates the hashmap with textures. the idea is to serialize no doubled referred images and save performance

recoverPImages

void recoverPImages(processing.core.PApplet applet)
Wraps texture data back into PImage and links to all referenced triangles. Call that right after deserializing
